    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_110945</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_110945</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Brightness of stars</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helligkeit der Sterne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'éclat de tient le premier rôle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Brilho das estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Luminosità delle stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωτεινότητα των αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Brillo de estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These charts illustrate the scale of apparent magnitudes of brightness of different stars and Venus (a) and the scale of  absolute magnitudes of brightness of different stars (b).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">brightness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Rigel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Scales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">telescopes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme veranschaulichen die Skala der 
offensichtlichen Größen Helligkeit unterschiedlicher Sterne und des 
Venus (a) und der Skala der absoluten Größen Helligkeit 
unterschiedlicher Sterne (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes illustrent l'échelle des 
importances apparentes d'éclat de différent tient le premier rôle et Venus
(a) et l'échelle des importances absolues d'éclat de différent 
tient le premier rôle (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas cartas ilustram a escala de valores 
aparentes do brilho das estrelas diferentes e do Venus (a) e da escala
de valores absolutos do brilho das estrelas diferentes (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste tabelle illustrano la scala delle 
grandezze apparenti di luminosità delle stelle differenti e di Venus 
(a) e della scala delle grandezze assolute di luminosità delle stelle
differenti (b).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα επεξηγούν την κλίμακα των 
προφανών μεγεθών της φωτεινότητας των διαφορετικών αστεριών και 
της Αφροδίτης (α) και την κλίμακα των απόλυτων μεγεθών της 
φωτεινότητας των διαφορετικών αστεριών (β).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas cartas ilustran la escala de las magnitudes
evidentes de brillo de diversas estrellas y de Venus (a) y de la 
escala de magnitudes absolutas de brillo de diversas estrellas (b).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helligkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
